title: Hochul Planning Big Expansion of New York’s Nuclear Capacity
description: New York Governor Kathy Hochul is significantly expanding her push for new nuclear capacity to meet surging demand for electricity.
content: New York Governor Kathy Hochul is significantly expanding her push for new nuclear capacity to meet surging demand for electricity.
